Clip.Title: THE AMAZON CODE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Once Missionary Daniel Everett met the Piraha tribe, it wasn't the word of God he was interested in spreading. Instead, Everett spent over 30 years trying to decipher their strange language and inadvertently propelled himself into linguistic fame and controversy.

Clip.Title: AMYU: THE ARMY OF THE WASP MEN
Clip.Episode: Amyu: The Army of Wasp Men
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Amazon forest, two young Kayapo boys must undergo a terrible initiatory ordeal of striking a wasp's nest, thereby provoking a violent wasp attack, in order to become strong and brave Kayapo warriors.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Cuba by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: THE AMAZON CODE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Once Missionary Daniel Everett met the Piraha tribe, it wasn't the word of God he was interested in spreading. Instead, Everett spent over 30 years trying to decipher their strange language and inadvertently propelled himself into linguistic fame and controversy.

Clip.Title: AMYU: THE ARMY OF THE WASP MEN
Clip.Episode: Amyu: The Army of Wasp Men
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Amazon forest, two young Kayapo boys must undergo a terrible initiatory ordeal of striking a wasp's nest, thereby provoking a violent wasp attack, in order to become strong and brave Kayapo warriors.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Christian Peacemaker Father Bob Holmes travels to Colombia where he becomes a human shield for the new union leader.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Sharon Ruiz-Duremdes' mission is to find replacements for murdered Filipino clergy before she, herself, is killed.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey along Nova Scotia's Bay of Fundy coastline is a cultural and geological marvel - from historic Acadian Villages, to world-famous stone formations - rising from the sea.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: AMYU: THE ARMY OF THE WASP MEN
Clip.Episode: Amyu: The Army of Wasp Men
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Amazon forest, two young Kayapo boys must undergo a terrible initiatory ordeal of striking a wasp's nest, thereby provoking a violent wasp attack, in order to become strong and brave Kayapo warriors.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Little parts of our world disappear every day. Join host, Tom Cavanagh as learns what Smithsonian experts are doing to protect the best aspects of our world for future generations using "extreme conservation."

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: join host Tom Cavanagh (from TV's "Ed") as we explore the crime "scene" at the Smithsonian's Vaults: photographic evidence from the Crime of the Century; everyone's favorite natural villain, the snake; and America's first "Lone Gunman": John Wilkes Booth.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1975, The Sentry, a state-of-the-art Russian warship, was taken over by a rogue Soviet officer. This remarkable mutiny not only inspired the best-selling political thriller and the Sean Connery/Alec Baldwin blockbuster, "The Hunt for Red October," it almost triggered World War III.

Clip.Title: PHIL COLLINS: GOING BACK TO DETROIT
Clip.Episode: Phil Collins: Going Back to Detroit
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Phil Collins back to the birthplace of Motown, as he joins the Funk Brothers for one soul-filled night of legendary music.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Isola di Dino to Reggio Calabria
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Isola di Dino to Reggio Calabria, travel along the Ionic coast looking for the historical roots of Calabria from the ancient column of Hera Lacinia to Locri up until the wild landscapes of Aspromonte.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Pentedattilo to Sibari we continue our journey on the beautiful Tirrenic Coast, from the cliffs of Capo Vaticano to the charming sea town of Tropea.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The gas giants of the outer solar system, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune, represent very different kind of planets, with exotic atmospheres, liquid interiors and rings.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Looking to beyond the rocky and gaseous worlds, to the dark domain of Pluto and beyond, we may find the history of the solar system preserved for us in a deep freeze.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: ALIENS INSIDE US
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every one of us teems with trillions of microorganisms. Some of these microbes are what we call "germs," but many more of them are actually good for us. Discover the health benefits of having aliens inside us, and see how those benefits are being threatened by our modern, sterile lifestyles.
